element.name: DESCRIPTION
element.text: This algorithm calculates the upslope area from a zone defined as a set of cells, instead of using just a single point.

element.name: INITZONES
element.text: A raster layer defining the outlet zone. Cells defining the zone can have any value except the no-data value. All remaining cells must have the no-data value.

element.name: RESULT
element.text: The resulting layer. Cells inside the upslope area have a value of 1, while cells outside of it have a value of 0
